briefTitle: Study to Evaluate IV CR845 in Hemodialysis Patients With Moderate-to-Severe Pruritus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in the Weekly Mean of the Daily 24-hour Worst Itching Intensity NRS Score During Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Intensity of itch was measured using a numerical rating scale (NRS) used to indicate the intensity of the worst itching over the past 24 hours using a 0 to 10 numeric rating scale, where "0" represents "no itching" and "10" represents "worst itching imaginable". Higher scores meant worse itch intensity.

outcomeMeasures.title: Improvement in Itch-related Quality of Life as Assessed by the Change From Baseline in Total Skindex-10 Scale Score at the End of Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: The Skindex-10 Scale is a multidimensional questionnaire which assesses itch-related quality of life over the past week. The questions cover 3 domains: disease, mood/emotional distress, and social functioning domain. A lower total score represents better quality of life. The minimum score is 0 and the maximum score is 60 (or total score can range from 0 to 60) with a higher score meaning a worse quality of life.
